Series.Actors: |Paolo Domingo|Selena Gonzalez |Daniel Beretta|Eamon Pirruccello|Frank Welker|Skai Jackson|Sylvie Feit Marie|Zachary Gordon|
Series.Overview: Bubble Guppies revolves around the underwater adventures of a group of mermaid-like preschoolers.

Episode.Overview: Oona's friend Avi broke a bone in his tail and has gone to see a doctor. The Bubble Guppies aren't too worried--after all, it's a doctor's job to make Avi feel better. Everybody say "Ahhhh!"

Green means GO! The Bubble Guppies are racing their quick, colorful cars for the ultimate prize--a big box of crayons! Take the wheel and help the racers mix colors, make new shades, and speed across the finish line!
Sit! Stay! Fetch! Gil wants to adopt a puppy! But the Bubble Guppies have to learn how to take care of a pet before he can bring the little guy home.

It's going to be the best doghouse EVER! But before Bubble Puppy can move into his new doggy digs the Bubble Guppies have to build it. So put on your hard hat and roll up your sleeves; construction is about to begin.

Duck! Nonny meets a Marching Band with a Duck problem. The Duck is in the way and they can't play their instruments! But with a little whistle, and a little help from Mr. Grouper and the Bubble Guppies, Nonny learns how to lead the Marching Band--ducks or no ducks.

At the Bubble Guppies restaurant you'll get a picture on your pizza and a smile on your face, unless of course you're the Grumpfish. From waiting tables to cooking food, the Bubble Guppies prepare to serve their most difficult customer yet. But is there anything on the menu that can get the Grumpfish grinning?

Have you ever seen the moon in the daytime? Have you ever noticed it kinda looks like a big pizza? The Guppies have! Blast off and leave your home planet behind--it's time to check out the solar system with the Bubble Guppies!

Episode.EpisodeName: Who's Gonna Play the Big Bad Wolf?
Episode.Overview: Set the stage and light the lights! The Bubble Guppies are learning about plays! They're going to see the all-starfish production of "The Three Little Pigs." But when one of the actors can't perform, it's up to Deema to put on the costume and take the stage. It's show time!
Are you ready to rock? The Bubble Guppies are taking the stage with their guitars, drums and keyboards. Get ready to crank it up to 10 and learn about everything rock and roll.

The Bubble Guppies explore different kinds of ball games as they get ready for their big game of Fishketball! Join Team Guppies to help them practice bouncing, throwing, catching and playing together as a team.
The Bubble Guppies are going on a camping trip! Grab your flashlights and gather around the campfire to make s'mores and hear about the spooky legend of Pinkfoot!
Pack a suitcase and hurry to the airport! Help the Bubble Guppies fly an airplane through the sky and over the clouds-just be sure to keep an eye out for airplane pirates!
The Guppies have to plant a flower for the Spring Chicken.
A squirrel named Doug gives Nonny an acorn, making Nonny wonder if it can become an acorn tree. But the Guppies have to learn about trees (and recycling) first!

A mother cow named Butterscotch is about to give birth to a new baby.
Note: This is the Mother's Day special. Mr. Grouper sing the pop song instead of Molly or Gil.
Songs: "The Farmer's Song", "Milk the Cow"
Shop: Animal Caller
Lunch Joke: Cheese and tractors
Storybook: "The Farmer and the Farmhand" Field Trip: The farm.
The kids head to a huge bash their town is hosting at the top of Big Bubble Building.
The kids learn about mail before sending out an invitation to a party for Clam.
The kids go to a dinosaur dig site, where they ask questions about the prehistoric creatures.
The Bubble Guppies head to the supermarket to shop for fruits, vegetables and a box of Bubble Bites for Bubble Puppy.
The Bubble Guppies are invited to a costume party at a haunted house.
The Guppies help a friendly pirate search for treasure using a map.
The Guppies try to spread the joy of the holiday season to Mr. Grumpfish.
The Guppies learn about the zoo while trying to find a friend for a lonely rhinoceros.

Once upon a time, Molly and Gil went up a hill to fetch a pail of water. But when a mean witch, played by Wanda Sykes, turns Bubble Puppy into a frog. Molly and Gil seek the help of Little Red Riding Hood (Oona), Goldilocks (Deema), and Jack (Goby), they soon learn from a magic mirror (Nonny, who was cursed by the Witch's mean green bubble potion by being trapped in the mirror and was forced to work for her), that they can change the potion to one that that will undo her curse is to put Red Riding Hood's cookies, Goldilocks' porridge, and Jack's golden egg into the potion. And with the help of Jack's beans, the Bubble Guppies plan to stop the witch, but can they save the world from being turned into frogs?
Yee-haw! Molly wants to be a cowgirl like Dusty, the riden'-est, ropin'-est cowgirl in the parade! But when Dusty's calf gets into trouble, Molly has to use everything she's learned to save the day.

When Gil and Bubble Puppy get stuck in a tree, a heroic team of firefighters comes to the rescue! But what happens when the firefighters get stuck in a tree? Can Gil and his team of Bubble Guppy firefighters work together and save the day?
Deema has a loose tooth, and when it falls out, she's going to get a visit from the Tooth Fairy! Until then, the Bubble Guppies have lots to discover about keeping a healthy smile.

There are lots of different kinds of trucks, but only one that can turn into a giant robot - Humunga-Truck! The Bubble Guppies learn all about different kinds of trucks on their way to the big Truck Show!
Gil and his friends dive into Gil's favorite books to find his missing library card.
Molly's friend needs the Guppies' help to finish her work in time to attend the Big Beach Ball.
The Guppies perform in a circus.
Goby must retrace his steps to find his lost toy at a construction site.
The Guppies stand in a for a magician and attempt to make an elephant disappear.
Molly, Gil and a duckling named Beep help a family of ducks that are lost in a storm cloud.
A steam locomotive enters a train race, but a herd of cows on the tracks threatens to derail its chances of winning.
Join the Bubble Guppies on an adventure to ancient Egypt, as they follow clues across the desert.
Nonny is on a quest to become a real knight! He has a shield. He has a suit of armor.
Learn all about bugs
Learn all about hair! Gil needs to get his hair cut before picture day.
Oona's friend is worried about his first day of school; the guppies reveal that school is a great place to learn, play and meet new friends.
Officer Miranda teaches Gil and the other children how police officers use laws to keep people safe.
Gil and his friends attend a basketball game played by elephants.
Molly and the Guppies want to learn how to tell a story through dance.

After Molly and Gil meet Bobby, a nature show host from Australia, they can't wait to learn all about Australian animals. From marsupials to the amazing platypus, the Guppies can't get enough of the creatures Down Under!
This show is geared towards preschoolers and takes place in an underwater classroom in a place called Bubbletucky filled with crabs, lobsters and 6 mermaid children.
A veterinarian takes care of Bubble Puppy when he has a cold.

In the mythical land of Bubbledom, the evil Night Wizard has taken the magical Ring of the Sun! Someone needs to save the daytime! Will Molly and Gil return the Ring to the Sun King, or will it be nighttime in Bubbledom forever?
The children try to figure out how to get Mr. Grouper's car started after it breaks down on the way to an amusement park.
The children try to teach Mr. Grumpfish about their favorite things when he is their substitute teacher.

It's time for baby animals! Goby dreams up the Oyster Bunny, a mysterious character who loves baby animals. Can the Guppies follow an egg trail to find the elusive Oyster Bunny? A tasty treat awaits them!
After Gil and Molly meet a conductor, the Guppies want to join an orchestra.

Oh no! Nonny broke his glasses! When they're fixed, Nonny is determined to retrieve them on his own. But to do it, he'll have to depend on his other four senses to reach the glasses store before it closes!
The kids use teamwork to turn nectar into honey in time for the queen bee's afternoon tea.
The kids celebrate boats with a bash at sea, but the festivities are threatened by snow-cone ice.
The residents of Bubbletucky are catching colds! The kids learn how to prevent themselves from getting sick.
The Mayor gets a tummy ache while training for Bubbletucky's annual marathon.
When Molly and Gil discover the pumpkin patch is empty, their turkey friend leads them on a hunt to find the guilty party.
The kids go on a sleigh ride after their van breaks down in the snow and Mr. Claws and his horse arrive to save the day.
When rain spoils a game of kickball, Gil invents a new game; Bubble Puppy is afraid of thunder.
Gil and Goby bring a tadpole to school to watch it grow into a frog.
When Molly and Gil find a lost kitten named Bubble Kitty, they help take the cat home to Meownt Rushmore.

When Molly and Gil bring a comic book to school, all the Guppies want to be superheroes! In the comic book's pages, the smelly villain Sid Fishy aims to make the whole city stinky! Molly and Gil dive into the adventure as Guppy Girl and Bubble Boy, but can our heroes stop Sid?

Episode.EpisodeName: A Dolphin Is a Guppy's Best Friend!
Episode.Overview: Molly, Gil and the Guppies must lead a baby dolphin named Buddy to the surprise birthday party his pod is throwing for him.

Molly meets Demanda, a princess in training. She'll have to demonstrate all the exceptional qualities of a princess to earn her crown. Molly helps Demanda with her manners, and together they'll become true princesses in the hallowed Glitter Games.
